docs.title: Welcome to Orsino
docs.text:
Orsino is a flexible, open-source framework for building turn-based RPG games. It provides a robust set of tools and systems to help you create immersive worlds, engaging characters, and dynamic gameplay experiences.

This documentation is autogenerated from the source code and configuration files of the Orsino project. It covers various aspects of the framework, including:

  • Treasure tables and magic item lists
  • Spellcasting systems
  • Combat statuses and effects
  • Character traits and abilities

2 School of Necromancy Touch an enemy to slow their movements for 3 rounds. An enemy suffers Slow (Degrade Dexterity by 5, degrade initiative by 10, degrade attacks per turn by 1); Deal 1d2 cold damage to an enemy.

Cold Snap

Cantrip School of Conjuration Release a burst of cold energy from your hands. Deal 1d6 cold damage to an enemy.

Cone of Cold

5 School of Evocation Blast enemies in a cone with intense cold. Deal 3d12 cold damage to =1d6 + floor(#level / 2) random enemies.

Confusion

3 School of Illusion Confuse an enemy, causing them to act randomly. An enemy suffers Confused (Actions are random).

Contagion

7 School of Necromancy Infect enemies with a virulent disease that worsens over time. Deal 3d6 + #level necrotic damage to all enemies; All enemies suffer Diseased (Degrade Constitution by 2, degrade all saves by 2, On turn end, Deal 1d4 necrotic damage to self).

Dancing Lights

Cantrip School of Illusion Create small lights that hover and move. All enemies suffer Distracted (Degrade to hit by 1, degrade bonus damage by 1, degrade evasion by 5); All enemies suffer Blinded (Degrade to hit by 4, degrade evasion by 10, degrade all rolls by 2).

Death Wave

9 School of Evocation Emit a wave of necrotic energy that damages all enemies within range. Deal 10d6 necrotic damage to all enemies.

Demorph

6 School of Divination Force a shapeshifter to revert to its original form. Remove polymorphed

Disintegrate

5 School of Evocation A green ray that dematerializes living forms leaps from your fingertips. Deal 10d6 force damage to an enemy.

Dismal Ray

3 School of Necromancy A black energy ray weakens an enemy. An enemy suffers Weakened (Degrade Strength by 2, degrade bonus damage by 2); Deal 2d6 necrotic damage to an enemy.

Dispel Magic

2 School of Abjuration Remove all effects. Remove .* from yourself or an ally or an enemy.

Disruption

4 School of Abjuration Imbue a weapon with disruptive energy especially harmful to undead and constructs. Grant yourself or an ally Disrupting (On attack, Deal 2d6 true damage to target; Deal 3d6 radiant damage to target if undead

Dissolving Touch

6 School of Conjuration Your touch causes matter to dissolve away. Deal 4d6 acid damage to an enemy.

Distraction

4 School of Enchantment Greatly distract an enemy, giving them a -4 penalty to attack rolls for 3 rounds. An enemy suffers Distracted (Degrade to hit by 1, degrade bonus damage by 1, degrade evasion by 5).

Drench

1 School of Transmutation Drench an enemy, reducing their attack rolls by 2 for 3 rounds. An enemy suffers Drenched (Degrade to hit by 2, 100% vulnerability to Lightning, 200% vulnerability to Cold).

Earthquake

4 School of Evocation Cause the ground to shake. Deal 2d6 bludgeoning damage to all enemies; All enemies suffer Prone (Cannot take actions, degrade Dexterity by 2).

Electric Arc

3 School of Evocation An arc of electricity jumps to multiple targets. Deal 1d8 lightning damage to an enemy cascading =1+floor(#level/2) times.

Enlarge

4 School of Transmutation Increase an ally's size and strength. Grant yourself or an ally Enlarged (Improve Strength by 4, add =1d4 to bonus damage, improve to hit by 1, degrade AC by 1, degrade evasion by 5).

False Life

4 School of Necromancy Grant yourself temporary hit points. Grant yourself False Life (Gain =10d6 + 2 * #level temporary HP).

Fire Storm

6 School of Evocation Produce a raging firestorm that engulfs enemies in flames. Deal 6d6 fire damage to all enemies.

Fireball

4 School of Evocation Hurl a destructive ball of energy that explodes in a fiery blast. Deal 6d6 fire damage to all enemies.

Firebolt

1 School of Evocation A small bolt of fire shoots from your fingertips. Deal 1d6 fire damage to an enemy.

Flesh to Stone

6 School of Transmutation Turn an enemy to stone. An enemy suffers Petrified (Cannot take actions, Immunity to Fear, Immunity to Charm, Immunity to Stun, Immunity to Sleep, Immunity to Poison, Immunity to Disease).

Fly

3 School of Transmutation Grant the ability to fly for a short duration. Grant yourself or an ally Flight (Improve evasion by 20, improve AC by 5).

Foresight

9 School of Divination Gain unparalleled insight into future events, granting near-perfect advantage on all rolls. Grant yourself or an ally Greater Focus (Improve to hit by 4, improve Save versus Magic by 5, improve bonus spell DC by 4, improve bonus spell slots by 2); Grant yourself or an ally Archmage's Insight (Improve Intelligence by 6, improve all rolls by 3, improve all saves by 5, improve bonus spell DC by 4, improve bonus spell slots by 1); Grant yourself or an ally Perfect Clarity (Improve Intelligence by 2, improve all rolls by 3, improve all saves by 2, Immunity to Charm, Immunity to Insanity); Grant yourself or an ally Raven's Cunning (Improve Intelligence by 4, improve all rolls by 2); Grant yourself or an ally Sage's Wisdom (Improve Wisdom by 4, improve all rolls by 2, improve all saves by 2).

Foretelling

4 School of Divination Gain profound insight into future events, granting significant advantage on upcoming rolls. Grant yourself or an ally Greater Focus (Improve to hit by 4, improve Save versus Magic by 5, improve bonus spell DC by 4, improve bonus spell slots by 2); Grant yourself or an ally Archmage's Insight (Improve Intelligence by 6, improve all rolls by 3, improve all saves by 5, improve bonus spell DC by 4, improve bonus spell slots by 1).

Frostbite

Cantrip School of Evocation A chilling blast of cold air. Deal 1d4 cold damage to an enemy.

Ghost Touch

Cantrip School of Transmutation Induce necrosis with your touch. Grant yourself Ghost Touch (On attack hit, Deal 1d3 necrotic damage to target).

Glyph of Warding

5 School of Illusion Create a magical glyph that triggers a terrifying illusion when activated. Grant yourself Warding Glyph (No enchantment).

Gravity Crush

6 School of Evocation Create a powerful gravitational collapse at a target location, damaging all enemies within the area. Deal 10d6 force damage to all enemies.

Greater Augury

7 School of Divination Receive a powerful omen that grants exceptional perception and insight. Grant yourself Major Augured (Improve Intelligence by 4, improve Wisdom by 4, improve all rolls by 3, improve all saves by 3, improve initiative by 10); Grant yourself Greater Focus (Improve to hit by 4, improve Save versus Magic by 5, improve bonus spell DC by 4, improve bonus spell slots by 2); Grant yourself Archmage's Insight (Improve Intelligence by 6, improve all rolls by 3, improve all saves by 5, improve bonus spell DC by 4, improve bonus spell slots by 1).

Greater Contagion

8 School of Necromancy Infect multiple enemies with a deadly disease that worsens rapidly. Deal 5d6 + #level necrotic damage to all enemies; All enemies suffer Diseased (Degrade Constitution by 2, degrade all saves by 2, On turn end, Deal 1d4 necrotic damage to self).

Greater Distraction

8 School of Enchantment Extremely distract enemies, giving them a -6 penalty to attack rolls for 5 rounds. All enemies suffer Severely Distracted (Degrade to hit by 2, degrade bonus damage by 2, degrade evasion by 10, degrade all rolls by 1).

Haste

5 School of Transmutation Increase an ally's speed. Grant an ally Haste (Improve Dexterity by 4, improve initiative by 10, improve attacks per turn by 1, improve AC by 2).

Ice Bolt

3 School of Evocation A bolt of freezing ice shoots from your fingertips. Deal 2d12 cold damage to an enemy.

Ice Storm

6 School of Evocation Create a storm of ice and hail that damages enemies within the area. Deal 4d12 cold damage to all enemies; Deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage to all enemies.

Major Image

4 School of Illusion Create a large, detailed illusory creature to deceive or distract. Summon level 5 animal.

Invisibility

6 School of Illusion Turn invisible for 5 rounds or until you attack or cast a spell. Grant yourself or an ally Invisible (Invisible, On attack, Remove Invisible from self, On offensive casting, Remove Invisible from self).

Globe of Invulnerability

8 School of Abjuration Become nearly impervious to all damage for a short duration. Grant yourself Invulnerable (Untargetable).

Lightning Bolt

4 School of Evocation Strike random enemies with lightning. Deal 2d8 electric damage to 2 random enemies; 2 random enemies suffer Paralyzed (Cannot take actions, degrade Strength by 5, degrade Dexterity by 5).

Magebane

2 School of Abjuration Create an aura that harms enemy spellcasters when they cast spells. Grant an enemy Magebane (On enemy casting, Deal 2d6 true damage to caster for 3 turns).

Magic Missile

1 School of Evocation Fire three magical bolts that automatically hit and deal 1d3 damage each (more bolts and damage at higher levels). Deal 1d3 + floor(#level/3) force damage to 2 + round(#level/2) random enemies.

Major False Life

9 School of Necromancy Grant yourself a large amount of temporary hit points. Grant yourself Major False Life (Gain =20d6 + 4 * #level temporary HP, 50% resistance to Necrotic, improve Save versus Death by 2).

Major Reflection

8 School of Abjuration Create a powerful magical shield that reflects a large portion of incoming damage. Grant yourself Major Reflect (Add 75% to damage reflection percent).

Major Ward

3 School of Abjuration Create a powerful magical ward that absorbs a significant amount of damage. Grant yourself Major Warded (Improve Save versus Magic by 2, improve all saves by 1, 25% resistance to Fire, 25% resistance to Cold, 25% resistance to Lightning, 75% resistance to Force, 25% resistance to Acid, 25% resistance to Sonic, 25% resistance to Necrotic, Gain =21 + 3 * #level temporary HP).

Mass Confusion

7 School of Illusion Confuse multiple enemies, causing them to act randomly. All enemies suffer Confused (Actions are random).

Major Distraction

6 School of Enchantment Severely distract enemies. All enemies suffer Distracted (Degrade to hit by 1, degrade bonus damage by 1, degrade evasion by 5).

Mass Mind Blank

8 School of Divination Protect your mind from all forms of mental intrusion and detection for 1 hour. Grant all allies Mind Blank (50% resistance to Psychic, improve Save versus Will by 2, Immunity to Charm, Immunity to Insanity, Immunity to Fear, Immunity to Sleep).

Maze

8 School of Conjuration Banish an enemy to a labyrinthine demiplane for up to 10 minutes. An enemy suffers In Maze (Cannot take actions, Untargetable).

Meteor Swarm

7 School of Evocation Produces a swarm of meteors that strike multiple enemies, causing massive fire and bludgeoning damage. Deal 8d6 fire damage to =5 + floor(#level / 2) random enemies; Deal 2d6 bludgeoning damage to =5 + floor(#level / 2) random enemies.

Mind Blank

2 School of Divination Protect your mind from mental intrusion and detection for 10 minutes. Grant yourself or an ally Mind Blank (50% resistance to Psychic, improve Save versus Will by 2, Immunity to Charm, Immunity to Insanity, Immunity to Fear, Immunity to Sleep).

Mind Reading

3 School of Divination Read the surface thoughts of a target creature for a short duration. Grant an enemy Mind Reading (Can read surface thoughts of others for 5 turns).

Minor Distraction

Cantrip School of Enchantment Distract an enemy, giving them a -2 penalty to attack rolls for 1 round. An enemy suffers Distracted (Degrade to hit by 1, degrade bonus damage by 1, degrade evasion by 5).

Minor Foretelling

Cantrip School of Divination Gain insight into future events, granting advantage on upcoming rolls. Grant yourself or an ally Focus (Improve to hit by 2, improve Save versus Magic by 3, improve bonus spell DC by 2, improve bonus spell slots by 1).

Minor Image

Cantrip School of Illusion Create an illusory creature to distract or deceive. Summon level 1 animal.

Minor Ward

Cantrip School of Abjuration Create a small magical barrier to protect against harm. Grant yourself Minor Warded (Improve Save versus Magic by 1, 25% resistance to Force, Gain =7 + #level temporary HP).

Mirror Image

2 School of Illusion Illusory duplicates confound attackers Grant yourself Mirror Images (Improve AC by 2, improve all saves by 2, improve evasion by 15).

Obscuring Mist

3 School of Conjuration Create a mist that obscures vision. Grant yourself Hidden (Improve AC by 4, improve evasion by 10, On attack, Remove Hidden from self).

Paralyzing Touch

2 School of Necromancy Touch an enemy to paralyze them for 2 rounds. An enemy suffers Paralyzed (Cannot take actions, degrade Strength by 5, degrade Dexterity by 5).

Perfect Turning

9 School of Abjuration Create a magical barrier that reflects almost all spells back to their casters. Grant yourself Major Spellturn (Add 75% to spell reflection chance).

Plane Shift

7 School of Conjuration Transport yourself and your party to another plane of existence. Planeshift yourself to =oneOf(Arcadia, Cthelll, Gehenna, Hades, Limbo, Mechanus, Pandemonium, Ysgard, Zephyrus).

Poison Cloud

5 School of Conjuration Release a cloud of toxic gas. Deal 3d4+#level poison damage to all enemies.

Polar Ray

6 School of Evocation Fire a beam of intense cold that can freeze enemies in place. Deal 5d6 cold damage to an enemy.

Polymorph Other

5 School of Transmutation Transform an enemy into a harmless creature for a short duration. An enemy suffers Polymorphed (Displayed name changed to "Sheep", Displayed class changed to "Simple Beast", attack die set to 1d2, MAXHP set to 5, AC set to 10, STR set to 2, CON set to 2, DEX set to 2, INT set to 2, WIS set to 2, CHA set to 2, Abilities set to: Melee, Bleat, Flee, May not use items); Recalculate HP for target.

Prismatic Spray

2 School of Evocation A dazzling array of multicolored beams springs from your hand. Cycle through the following effects on =7 + round(#level / 2) random enemies: Deal 1d3+1 fire damage to enemy; Deal 1d4 force damage to enemy; Deal 1d3 poison damage to enemy; Deal 1d3 lightning damage to enemy; Deal 1d2 acid damage to enemy; Deal 1d4 cold damage to enemy; Cast ability Flesh To Stone (An enemy suffers Petrified (Cannot take actions, Immunity to Fear, Immunity to Charm, Immunity to Stun, Immunity to Sleep, Immunity to Poison, Immunity to Disease).) on enemy; Deal 1d4 psychic damage to enemy; Deal 1d2+1 radiant damage to enemy; Deal 1d2 necrotic damage to enemy.

Psi Shield

5 School of Enchantment Create a mental shield that grants resistance to psychic damage. Grant yourself or an ally Mindproof (50% resistance to Psychic, Immunity to Charm, Immunity to Insanity, Immunity to Fear, Immunity to Sleep).

Mind Melt

2 School of Enchantment Invade minds of all enemies, dealing 1d6 psychic damage and stunning them. Deal 1d6 psychic damage to all enemies; All enemies suffer Stunned (Cannot take actions, degrade all rolls by 2); All enemies suffer Charmed (Allegiance changed).

Quieten

6 School of Abjuration Create an area where sound is magically suppressed. Grant all enemies Silence (Cannot cast spells).

Ray of Frost

2 School of Evocation Fire a ray of frost, dealing 1d4 damage and reducing the target's speed by 10 feet for 3 rounds. Deal 1d4 cold damage to an enemy.

Reflection

5 School of Abjuration Create a magical shield that reflects some incoming damage. Grant yourself Reflect (Add 50% to damage reflection percent).

Revelation

5 School of Divination Unveil hidden truths, revealing invisible or disguised creatures and objects. Remove hidden

Sandstorm

3 School of Evocation Create a swirling sandstorm that damages and blinds enemies within it for 3 rounds. Deal 2d6 bludgeoning damage to all enemies; All enemies suffer Blinded (Degrade to hit by 4, degrade evasion by 10, degrade all rolls by 2).

Scald

Cantrip School of Evocation Blast an enemy with superheated steam. Deal 1d4 fire damage to an enemy; An enemy suffers Scalded (Degrade all rolls by 1).

Second Sight

1 School of Divination For a moment, perceive the true nature of things, gaining enhanced evasion and accuracy. Grant yourself or an ally Second Sight (Improve evasion by 10, improve to hit by 5, Can perceive invisible entities for 2 turns).

Shapechange

9 School of Transmutation Transform into a dragon. Grant yourself shapechanged (Displayed name changed to "Dragon", Displayed class changed to "Dragon", MAXHP set to 90, AC set to -10, STR set to 22, CON set to 24, DEX set to 23, INT set to 25, WIS set to 23, CHA set to 24, Weapon set to ice_breath for 20 turns).

Shock Pulse

Cantrip School of Evocation Release a pulse of electrical energy that arcs to additional targets. Deal 1d4 lightning damage to an enemy cascading =1+floor(#level/2) times.

Shocking Grasp

2 School of Evocation Deliver a jolt of electricity. Deal 1d6 lightning damage to an enemy.

Shrieking Missile

1 School of Necromancy Fire a missile that emits a horrifying shriek. Deal 3d3 necrotic damage to an enemy; An enemy suffers Frightened (Degrade to hit by 2, degrade initiative by 5, degrade all rolls by 1, degrade all saves by 2).

Silence

3 School of Illusion Create an area of silence, preventing spellcasting for 3 rounds. All enemies suffer Silence (Cannot cast spells).

Siphon Life

1 School of Necromancy Drain life energy from an enemy. Drain an enemy 1d6 HP.

Sleep

3 School of Enchantment Lull enemies into a magical slumber. All enemies suffer Asleep (Cannot take actions).

Slow

2 School of Transmutation Reduce the speed of your foes. All enemies suffer Slow (Degrade Dexterity by 5, degrade initiative by 10, degrade attacks per turn by 1).

Soot Cloud

Cantrip School of Conjuration Create a cloud of soot that reveals hidden or invisible creatures. Remove hidden

Sound Lance

3 School of Evocation A concentrated blast of noise explodes from your hand. Deal 1d10 sonic damage to an enemy.

Spark

1 School of Evocation A small jolt of electricity. Deal 1d4 lightning damage to an enemy.

Spellturning

7 School of Abjuration Create a magical barrier may reflect spells back to their caster. Grant yourself Spellturn (Add 50% to spell reflection chance).

Stone to Flesh

6 School of Transmutation Restore a petrified creature to flesh. Remove Petrified from an ally.

Summon Elemental

4 School of Conjuration Summon a random elemental to fight for you. Summon of class Elemental monster.

Summon Greater Elemental

6 School of Conjuration Summon a powerful elemental to fight for you. Summon of class Elemental monster.

Summon Monster I

2 School of Conjuration Summon a random monster (beast or fey type) to fight for you. Summon of class =oneOf(beast, fey) monster.

Summon Monster II

3 School of Conjuration Summon a more powerful random monster (construct, giant, or demon) to fight for you. Summon of class =oneOf(construct, giant, demon) monster.

Summon Monster III

5 School of Conjuration Summon a powerful random monster (demon or celestial) to fight for you. Summon of class =oneOf(demon, celestial) monster.

Summon Monster IV

6 School of Conjuration Summon a mighty random construct or aberration to fight for you. Summon of class =oneOf(aberration, construct) monster.

Summon Monster V

7 School of Conjuration Summon a champion random creature to fight for you. Summon of class =oneOf(dragon, giant, celestial, demon, aberration) monster.

Summon Monster VI

8 School of Conjuration Summon a epic random creature to fight for you. Summon of class =oneOf(dragon, giant, celestial, demon, aberration) monster.

Summon Monster VII

9 School of Conjuration Summon a legendary random creature to fight for you. Summon of class =oneOf(dragon, giant, celestial, demon, aberration) monster.

Summon Vermin

1 School of Conjuration Summon a swarm of vermin to harass your enemies. Summon animal.

Symbol of Insanity

8 School of Illusion Insanity-inducing symbol that affects all enemies within range. All enemies suffer Insane (Actions are random, degrade all rolls by 1, degrade Save versus Will by 2).

Thunderclap

1 School of Evocation Create a burst of thunderous sound that damages and deafens enemies nearby. Deal 1d3 sonic damage to all enemies; All enemies suffer Deafened (50% resistance to Sonic, degrade bonus damage by 2, degrade AC by 2, degrade to hit by 2, degrade all saves by 1).

Time Stop

8 School of Transmutation Stop time for everyone but yourself. Grant yourself Time Stopped (Improve extra turns by 3, Does not trigger reactions).

True Seeing

4 School of Divination See through illusions, invisibility, and magical darkness for 10 minutes. Grant yourself or an ally True Sight (Can perceive invisible entities).

Arcane Ward

1 School of Abjuration Conjure a magical absorption ward. Grant yourself or an ally Warded (Improve Save versus Magic by 1, 15% resistance to Fire, 15% resistance to Cold, 15% resistance to Lightning, 50% resistance to Force, Gain =14 + 2 * #level temporary HP).

Warp Enemy

7 School of Transmutation Distort the fabric of reality around an enemy, causing unpredictable effects. Apply one of the following random effects to an enemy: An enemy suffers Stunned (Cannot take actions, degrade all rolls by 2); An enemy suffers Slow (Degrade Dexterity by 5, degrade initiative by 10, degrade attacks per turn by 1); An enemy suffers Weakened (Degrade Strength by 2, degrade bonus damage by 2); An enemy suffers Distracted (Degrade to hit by 1, degrade bonus damage by 1, degrade evasion by 5); Apply one of the following random effects to an enemy: An enemy suffers Cursed (Degrade all stats by 1); An enemy suffers Insane (Actions are random, degrade all rolls by 1, degrade Save versus Will by 2); An enemy suffers Charmed (Allegiance changed); An enemy suffers Frightened (Degrade to hit by 2, degrade initiative by 5, degrade all rolls by 1, degrade all saves by 2).

Weird

9 School of Illusion Create phantasmal creatures that frighten enemies within range. Summon of class Aberration monster.

Abyssal Shield

5 darkness domain Surround yourself with a shield of dark energy. Grant yourself Shielded (Improve AC by 1, Gain 10 temporary HP, improve Save versus Magic by 1); Grant yourself Bear's Endurance (Improve Constitution by 2, Gain 15 temporary HP); Grant yourself Minor Warded (Improve Save versus Magic by 1, 25% resistance to Force, Gain =7 + #level temporary HP).

Aegis of Faith

8 law domain Ward against all effects. Grant yourself Invulnerable (Untargetable).

Agony

4 chaos domain Inflict intense pain on an enemy. Deal 2d6 psychic damage to an enemy; An enemy suffers Agony (Degrade Intelligence by 1, degrade Wisdom by 1, On turn end, Deal 2d4 necrotic damage to self).

Anoint

1 life domain You mark your allies with a holy symbol, granting them protection. Grant all allies Anointed (50% resistance to Radiant, improve bonus damage by 1, improve to hit by 1, improve all saves by 2).

Apocalypse

9 death domain Unleash a cataclysmic storm of elemental fury upon all enemies. Deal 6d6 fire damage to all enemies; Deal 6d6 cold damage to all enemies; Deal 6d6 lightning damage to all enemies; All enemies suffer Doomed (Degrade all stats by 4 for 3 turns).

Barkskin

1 nature domain Your skin stiffens into tree-bark. Grant yourself Barkskin (Improve AC by 2).

Battle Cry

3 war domain Inspire your allies with a mighty battle cry. Grant all allies Inspired (Improve to hit by 2, Gain 5 temporary HP, improve all saves by 1); Grant all allies Courage (Improve all saves by 2, Immunity to Fear); Grant all allies Battlecry (Add =1d3 to bonus damage).

Black Hole

9 darkness domain Create a devastating black hole that damages and pulls in enemies. Deal 12d6 cold damage to all enemies.

Blade Barrier

4 law domain Create a wall of spinning blades that damages enemies passing through it. Grant yourself Blade Barrier (On enemy melee, Deal 3d6 slashing damage to attacker; Purge self of Blade Barrier for 5 turns).

Bless

1 life domain Bless an ally, granting them a divine boon. Grant yourself or an ally Blessed (Improve to hit by 1, improve bonus damage by 1).

Calm Emotions

2 nature domain Soothe strong emotions in a group of creatures. All enemies suffer Calm (Immunity to Fear, Immunity to Insanity, improve to hit by 1, improve Save versus Will by 2).

Chaotic Surge

2 chaos domain Unleash a surge of chaotic energy that damages and disorients enemies. Deal 1d8 psychic damage to all enemies; Apply one of the following random effects to all enemies: All enemies suffer Confused (Actions are random); All enemies suffer Slow (Degrade Dexterity by 5, degrade initiative by 10, degrade attacks per turn by 1); All enemies suffer Distracted (Degrade to hit by 1, degrade bonus damage by 1, degrade evasion by 5).

Cold Embrace

3 darkness domain Produce a chilling aura that damages nearby enemies. Deal 2d6 cold damage to all enemies; All enemies suffer Slow (Degrade Dexterity by 5, degrade initiative by 10, degrade attacks per turn by 1).

Cold Fire

5 death domain Unleash a blast of chilling energy. Deal 4d6 necrotic damage to an enemy; An enemy suffers Slow (Degrade Dexterity by 5, degrade initiative by 10, degrade attacks per turn by 1); An enemy suffers Frozen (Cannot take actions, degrade Dexterity by 5).

Command

5 law domain Give an instruction. Force an enemy to flee.

Confuse

1 chaos domain Confuse an enemy, causing them to act erratically. An enemy suffers Confused (Actions are random).

Consecrated Ground

3 law domain Consecrate the ground, damaging enemies who attack or cast spells near you. Grant yourself Consecrated (On enemy offensive casting, Purge self of Consecrated; Deal 2d6 radiant damage to caster, On enemy attack, Purge self of Consecrated; Deal 2d6 radiant damage to attacker).

Create Darkness

2 darkness domain Create an area of magical darkness that obscures vision. All enemies suffer Blinded (Degrade to hit by 4, degrade evasion by 10, degrade all rolls by 2).

Cruel Will

7 darkness domain Overwhelm the mind of an enemy. An enemy suffers Dominated (Allegiance changed, Actions are controlled).

Cure Light Wounds

1 life domain Bind moderate injuries. Heal yourself or an ally 1d8 HP.

Cure Critical Wounds

6 life domain Bind critical injuries. Heal yourself or an ally 4d8 HP.

Cure Disease

3 life domain Cure an ally of disease. Remove Diseased from an ally.

Cure Minor Wounds

Cantrip life domain Bind minor injuries. Heal yourself or an ally 1d4 HP.

Cure Moderate Wounds

3 life domain Bind moderate injuries. Heal yourself or an ally 2d8 HP.

Cure Serious Wounds

4 life domain Bind serious injuries. Heal yourself or an ally 3d8 HP.

Curse

Cantrip death domain Curse an enemy. An enemy suffers Cursed (Degrade all stats by 1).

Daylight

4 light domain Create a sphere of bright light. Deal 1d4 radiant damage to all enemies; Purge all enemies of Hidden.

Death

8 death domain Utter a power word in the blackest of tongues. Instantly kill an enemy.

Deathward

2 life domain Ward yourself or an ally against death. Grant yourself or an ally Death Ward (+5 to saves versus Death).

Deathbolt

1 death domain Hurl a bolt of shadowy energy at an enemy. Deal 2d6 necrotic damage to an enemy.

Death Touch

4 death domain Touch an enemy to curse them. Deal 3d6 necrotic damage to an enemy; An enemy suffers Cursed (Degrade all stats by 1).

Destroy Undead

7 war domain Channel divine energy to destroy undead creatures. Deal 5d6 radiant damage to all enemies if undead.

Dirge

3 death domain A mournful song that weakens your enemies. All enemies suffer Weakened (Degrade Strength by 2, degrade bonus damage by 2).

Discordant Wave

9 chaos domain Release a wave of chaotic energy that wreaks havoc on all enemies. Deal 8d6 psychic damage to all enemies; All enemies suffer Insane (Actions are random, degrade all rolls by 1, degrade Save versus Will by 2); All enemies suffer Confused (Actions are random); All enemies suffer Stunned (Cannot take actions, degrade all rolls by 2); All enemies suffer Distracted (Degrade to hit by 1, degrade bonus damage by 1, degrade evasion by 5); All enemies suffer Doomed (Degrade all stats by 4 for 3 turns).
